text: Indian Cultural Centre (ICC), Colombo will organize painting, drawing and writing competition for children on 11th November at its premises to commemorate Childrens Day, which falls on 14th November every year, coinciding with the birth anniversary of the first Prime Minister of India, Jawaharlal Nehru.The entries done by children on that day would be sent to New Delhi for the Shankars International Childrens Competition 2018. The Shankars International Childrens Competition 2018, in the categories of writing, painting and drawing, is open to children all over world born on or after January 1st 2002.Children who are interested in participating may register their names with the Centre (Tel. 011-2684698, Telefax 2684697, e-mail This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. document.getElementById('cloak9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f').innerHTML = ''; var prefix = 'ma' + 'il' + 'to'; var path = 'hr' + 'ef' + '='; var addy9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f = 'iccrcolombo2' + '@'; addy9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f = addy9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f + 'gmail' + '.' + 'com'; var addy_text9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f = 'iccrcolombo2' + '@' + 'gmail' + '.' + 'com';document.getElementById('cloak9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f').innerHTML += '<a ' + path + '\'' + prefix + ':' + addy9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f + '\'>'+addy_text9aa722c04cc3fea9037acbb2f2cead9f+'<\/a>'; ) and are requested to come to ICC at 9.00 am on 11th November.The last date for receipt of foreign entries in New Delhi for the Shankars Competition is 31st December 2017.
title: Shankars International Childrens Competition at ICC, Colombo
